itemDescription: British army officer, actor, theatre-manager, dramatist, barrister, journalist and writer

wikipedia_page.main: Francis Charles Philips (3 February 1849 – 21 April 1921) was a British army officer, actor, theatre-manager, dramatist, barrister, journalist, short story writer and novelist. He wrote over forty novels and over a dozen plays.
